study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: a budgetary lab-in-the-field experiment elicits the distributional preferences of the poor
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: the implementation rule of China's single-most important national poverty reduction program, which targeted interventions to households with income below a preset criterion, provides a quasi-experimental setting

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: China's single-most important national poverty reduction program
evidence_citations.country_citation: China's single-most important national poverty reduction program
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: targeted interventions to households with income below a preset criterion
